Class EdgeDetection

  • java.lang.Object
    • EdgeDetection

  • public class EdgeDetection
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    C1227040 Difference of Gaussian Class to handle DoG on the image. Known Limitations: - Calculating the DoG orientation is not currently possible so the Hough Space for DoG is not reduced
